nodes.text: The Ch'zimi'kho Conglomerate was an organization that existed during the time of the Clone Wars. During the war, Lok Durd's use of a bioweapon made of the poisonous material damotite on the planet Chandrila sowed fear throughout the galaxy. The Conglomerate—along with the planets Brentaal IV and Anaxes—offered to support the Republic's effort to destroy the weapon, but out of fear of Separatist retribution, they would not help until an antidote to the deadly weapon was found.
